author: Josh Dzieza
title: Amazon warehouse workers are outraged after a coworker tested positive for COVID-19 and they weren’t notified
description: Workers at 10 Amazon warehouses in the United States have tested positive for the coronavirus. Many learn of it through rumors and aren’t notified by the company.
content:
Ten Amazon warehouses in the US have had COVID-19 cases. Workers often hear of them through rumors. 
Bobbi Johnson, a worker at an Amazon warehouse south of Detroit, first saw the rumors on Facebook over the weekend. Kelly McIntosh-Butler, another worker at … [+9546 chars]
